title: Google Will Soon Show You AI-Generated Ads
description: Advertisers can save money and perhaps make ads more clickable using ChatGPT-style tools to generate text and images. Meta is testing similar technology.

title: Massive Sails Power Ships Like Never Before
description: Global trade relies on ships powered by dirty fuel. To meet climate deadlines, some are proposing a return to wind power.

title: The Not-So-Subtle Art of the Meme Coin
description: The wild success of Dogecoin and other joke cryptocurrencies has led to many imitators. But the joke has to come at somebody’s expense.
